title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Instagram Will Start Letting You Pick What Shows Up in Your Reels
items.description: In the battle for your attention, Instagram is betting that more control over the algorithm could keep you scrolling on Reels.

items.title: Amazon now offers same-day delivery of perishable groceries in 2,300 US cities
items.description: The e-commerce giant says it will expand the service to additional cities in 2026.

items.title: Kindle Scribe Colorsoft and Kindle Scribe (3rd Gen) Review (2025)
items.description: Amazon’s latest e-reader and digital notebook combos bring new features, but they may not be enough in a crowded market.

items.title: Oboe raises $16 million from a16z for its AI-powered course generation platform
items.description: Oboe has raised $16 million in funding for its learning app. The company now lets users generate unlimited courses for free.

items.title: Google launches managed MCP servers that let AI agents simply plug into its tools
items.description: Google is rolling out managed MCP servers to make its services “agent-ready by design,” starting with Maps and BigQuery, aiming to simplify messy inte...

items.title: Best Gifts for Hikers, Backpackers, Outdoorsy People (2025)
items.description: Let them pick out their own hiking boots. Instead, try gifting a useful blade or a nature journal to delight your outdoorsy friend.

items.title: A Complete Guide to the Jeffrey Epstein Document Dumps
items.description: New records about the infamous sex offender are released seemingly every week. Here's a quick rundown of who's releasing the Epstein documents, what t...

items.title: Unacademy’s founder says startup is now worth less than $500M, confirms M&A talks
items.description: Unacademy's valuation has dropped by over 85% from its pandemic-era peak price tag of $3.5 billion, its founder said.

items.title: 18 Best Gifts for Mom (2025): LED Masks, E-Readers, Blow-Dry Brushes
items.description: From high-tech skin care to cool accessories, these are our favorite picks for the WIRED mom in your life.

items.title: ChatGPT is Apple’s most downloaded app of 2025 in the US
items.description: This is ChatGPT's first year as the No. 1 app on the U.S. App Store by downloads.
